mapper.select: SELECT agent_id, company_id, name, phone_number, state, email, address, role, created_at, profile_image_url, email_verified FROM agents
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO agents (company_id, name, email, password, phone_number, address, role, state, created_at, profile_image_url, email_verified) VALUES (#{companyId}, #{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phoneNumber}, #{address}, #{role}, #{state}, #{createdAt}, #{profileImageUrl}, #{emailVerified})
mapper.update: UPDATE agents SET name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, address = #{address}, state = #{state}, profile_image_url = #{profileImageUrl} WHERE agent_id = #{agentId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM agents WHERE REPLACE(phone_number, '-', '') = REPLACE(#{phoneNumber}, '-', '')
